html: My full statement on the ballot count in #NY13pic.twitter.com/eF08Pz2Vx2
text: My full statement on the ballot count in #NY13pic.twitter.com/eF08Pz2Vx2

html: We simply cannot succeed unless all of us are moving forward together.
text: We simply cannot succeed unless all of us are moving forward together.

html: Our district is not a Latino or black or Asian district. It's a district that belongs to all of us.
text: Our district is not a Latino or black or Asian district.  It's a district that belongs to all of us.

html: To those who voted for one of my worthy opponents - I pledge to work my heart out to represent you
text: To those who voted for one of my worthy opponents - I pledge to work my heart out to represent you

html: I know - first-hand - how tough it is to come up short in a hard fought election.
text: I know - first-hand - how tough it is to come up short in a hard fought election.

html: Let's make sure that as we travel the short road ahead, we conduct ourselves with dignity and respect for the rights of all.
text: Let's make sure that as we travel the short road ahead, we conduct ourselves with dignity and respect for the rights of all.

html: To my supporters I say: we have traveled a long road to get here.
text: To my supporters I say:  we have traveled a long road to get here.

html: And I am confident that when all the votes are counted I will be the Democratic nominee.
text: And I am confident that when all the votes are counted I will be the Democratic nominee.

html: I will not rest until every absentee and affidavit ballot is counted.
text: I will not rest until every absentee and affidavit ballot is counted.

html: I have a real understanding of how crucial it is that every single voter's constitutional right be upheld and that every vote is counted.
text: I have a real understanding of how crucial it is that every single voter's constitutional right be upheld and that every vote is counted.

html: As the only candidate in this race who has ran in the last three primaries, and who in the last two campaigns lost by as few as 1,000 votes
text: As the only candidate in this race who has ran in the last three primaries, and who in the last two campaigns lost by as few as 1,000 votes

html: As an immigrant who was once undocumented in our country, I cannot express the pride I felt last night
text: As an immigrant who was once undocumented in our country, I cannot express the pride I felt last night

html: I am very proud that over 43,000 voters from the 13th Congressional District voted to select the Democratic nominee for Congress in 2016.
text: I am very proud that over 43,000 voters from the 13th Congressional District voted to select the Democratic nominee for Congress in 2016.
